resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105700</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105700</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210569</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Germanic Music - Folk Songs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Germanische Musik - Volksliede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique Germanique - Chansons Folkloriques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música Germanic - Canções Populares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica Germanica - Canzoni Pieghe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γερμανική μουσική - λαϊκά τραγούδια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Música Germánica - Canciones Populares</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This module, intended for grades 4-8, introduces students to Germanic folk music and culture using folk songs that celebrate being outdoors. Recommended for springtime.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Modul, für Grade 4-8 bestimmt, stellt 
Kursteilnehmer zur germanischen Volksmusik und zur Kultur mit 
Volkslieden vor, die draußen sein feiern. Empfohlen für 
Frühjahr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce module, destiné aux catégories 4-8, présente
des étudiants en musique folklorique et culture germaniques en 
utilisant les chansons folkloriques qui célèbrent être dehors. 
Recommandé pour le printemps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este módulo, pretendido para classes 4-8, 
introduz estudantes à música popular e à cultura germanic usando as
canções populares que comemoram estar ao ar livre. Recomendado
para o springtime.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo modulo, destinato ai gradi 4-8, introduce 
gli allievi a musica ed alla coltura di piega germaniche usando le 
canzoni pieghe che celebrano essere all'aperto. Suggerito per 
springtime.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η ενότητα, προοριζόμενη για τους βαθμούς 4-8, 
εισάγει τους σπουδαστές στη γερμανικούς λαϊκούς μουσική και τον 
πολιτισμό χρησιμοποιώντας τα λαϊκά τραγούδια που γιορτάζουν να 
υπαίθρια. Συστημένος για την άνοιξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este módulo, previsto para los grados 4-8, 
introduce a estudiantes a la música tradicional y a la cultura 
germánicas usando las canciones populares que celebran estar al aire 
libre. Recomendado para la primavera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770210569</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105700</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/germanic-music-folk-songs</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
